Today, I heard a mouse in my basement ceiling. I set a trap early this evening and the problem is already resolved. The only reason I didnt give five stars is because I cant find replacement bands at the stores where the traps are sold. I dont need ten traps laying around my house, I just need more bands!

product_name: AMDRO Ant Block Home Perimeter Ant Bait 24oz
review_title: TLDR: THE solution for an ant problem
review_text: Product works absolutely perfectly, I had ants in my yard with a very large colony spread from front to back yard of both red and black ants, after putting Amdro AntBlock around the perimeter of my property and onto the nest entrances, for the first 3 days we noticed increased ant activity as the poison is also a bait, This attracts the ants, But after 3 days the poison has made its way into the food supply for the anthill and ideally will kill its queen, causing the colony to collapse, After two weeks we no longer saw ANY ants, treatment lasts about one year as well, As with all pesticides or other household chemicals be sure to thoroughly read any and all information and warnings on the package before using

product_name: AMDRO Mouse Trap
review_text: That little @$#@@ been scratching in my bedroom wall every night at 2am! Hes been waking me up! I wasnt even sure where to put the trap. Do I need to drill a hole in the wall? I procrastinated a few days to figure out my game plan.Well tonight, not very long ago, I noticed droppings (and wall shavings) on the floor. I set the trap with cheddar, placed it a few inches from the droppings so it wouldnt be pressed against the corner, turned off the light, and laid to bed. 5 minutes later, i heard it! Not loud, not scary, really just annoying mouse sounds. I turned the light on.I watched his tail curl up - GROSS! Then he seemed to have a little seizure, but it didnt last long. If youre squeamish and hear the trap go off, just wait a minute before you investigate.I got my roommate to give him a proper dumpster burial. Hopefully I can sleep through the night now. 5 stars! 110%! Would definitely recommend to a friend. A+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

product_name: AMDRO Ant Block Home Perimeter Ant Bait 24oz
review_text: My order was received in a well packed box with everything I was expecting.  This product works for the ants around my house, I was getting invaded by ants every year until I started using this product.  It in no way lasts 3 months for me, but we have so many ants its ridiculous,  and I would imagine I would have to hire professional exterminators if I did not apply this every 1-1 months or so. I use it on approximately 1 acre of the property and with a small handheld spreader it takes 4 -24 oz containers to properly treat all the areas infested with ants. Since using this product  I have not had more than 2 small ants come in my home. The disturbingly large 1" ants still come in, but I dont know how to stop them. I figure they will soon be large enough to simply open my door and let themselves in! But this really is a great product if you have any ant infestations,  or even ant hills littering your yard. It hasnt seemed to affect the numerous other wildlife, such as frogs and toads, grasshoppers, butterflies and moths, spiders, dragonflies,  or birds.

product_name: AMDRO Ant Block Home Perimeter Ant Bait 12oz
review_text: I learned from using this product that you MUST use new (current year) stock or it will not be nearly as effective. I knew as soon as I opened the bottle that it was old, as the color of the active granules is a very light butter yellow. The granules in my bottle were dark yellow-old. I checked the date (stamped in ink on the bottle as part of a product code) and it was from 2020. NOT HAPPY.I expected being from Amazon that the product would have a large overturn and be very current stock-guess I should have asked the seller before purchase how old it was.Learn from my mistake and contact the seller to see what year the product was made.
